title: Update Collection and some other stuff
body:
Things that would be nice for...
•Collection:
There should be an update that should include wards in the collection tab
•Profile:
   -Highlights:
It would be nice to have other accounts be able to see highlights but can't delete the someone else's highlight.
•Chat bar: ty Yaiamone
~~You can send friend requests but you can't delete them once you have sent them because you can't find your sent friend requests~~.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

Mobile chat app:
It would be nice to create new runes on the go or edit them.
And have a status you can edit and use.
Change the order of the groups

replies.body: You can delete friend requests once you have sent them. You go to the little add friend button on your social list, click it, and then it will show sent requests. It gives you an option to delete from there.

Skin collection tab needs to be fixed for chromas.
My skins tab reads 5 chromas, but I have at least 20. It's not champs you have chromas for either, because I have chromas for more than 5 champs.
